hero.hero-title: Cutting edge online education for hospitality
hero.hero-subtitle: Bridging the skills gap for hotel managers

support-info.title: We support  the future generation  of hospitality industry
support-info.sub-title: While there is much talk of machines replacing people in the workplace, at Cordie we believe that the centrality of technology makes human development all the more crucial.

online-courses.title: Online courses for you
online-courses.sub-title: Contextualised and personalised hospitality learning at your fingertips.
online-courses.no-corses-caprion: We haven't added courses to this category yet. Please come back later!
online-courses.footer-title: Can’t you find course for you in this category?

about.title: What’s unique about Cordie?
about.sub-title: We have the critical factors to deliver real results.

card-one.title: Get real much-needed skills
card-one.description: Our quality curriculum is designed with top-tier industry partners, not academics, so you learn the high impact skills that are needed in today’s hospitality ecosystem.

card-two.title: Personalised coaching
card-two.description: Personalised coaching at each step, live open sessions with your professors and the help you need 24/7

card-three.title: Case-based
card-three.description: Immerse yourself in real-world learning. Lessons are brought to life through cases, which put you in the shoes of business leaders. Hear firsthand the challenges they faced, and wrestle with the same issues and imperfect information.

training-info.title: Online Executive Training
training-info.description: Cordie online courses are nothing like a typicalsit-back-and-listen lecture. You’ll engage in a new activity every three to five minutes. Each element is designed to keep you interested & involved.

mentors.title: Meet mentors & Coauthors
mentors.description: World-class faculty introduce you to the very latest in hospitality business knowledge and provide you with the tools and skills to overcome challenges and find solutions.

cordie-insights.title: Cordie Insights
cordie-insights.sub-title: Make the most of your learning experience

socials.title: Join our social media.
socials.description: Be the first to read useful articles and get information about latest promotions!

faq.title: Relax because we always be here for you.

form.question: Don't like forms? Send us an
form.title: Let's talk about everything.

hero.title: Programs Mentors & Co-authors
hero.sub-title: Our faculty members are internationally recognised hospitality leaders whom we are proud to work with.

contributors-container.title: Meet the experts
contributors-container.description: Cordie participants can benefit from a wide spectrum of experts with diverse backgrounds. Our expert team are knowledge creators and industry leaders at the cutting edge of their fields.

form.title: Become a contributing expert
form.description-one: Interested in contributing to providing top class hospitality online education?
form.description-two: Explore here to learn how you could be a part of it through sharing your expertise.
